text:
Currently the Target object does not have getter for if/unless conditions. As
the UnknowElement/RuntimeConfigurable is not applicable on targets there is
currently no way to get this information.
creator: ant-ml@ggtools.net

text:
Created attachment 11709
Patch to Target.java implementing getIf & getUnless
